name: Deadwood Duel
description:
A reflex shooter set in the Old West.

Choose your difficulty, watch the clock, and be quick - or be dead.

I created every part of the game: design, gameplay, and 100% of the assets (art, animation, sound and music). It was meant to be a quick project - there's a lot more I want to do with it, but after some extra tweaking, I had to move on. Hope it's a bit of fun!
